name: Bouncer 3D
description:
I originally thought of this game's idea. At first, this game was meant to be made multiplayer, where 2 astronauts come into the map having different types of shapes and fight each other based on this game's mechanics, but that didn't seem to happen due to time constraints.

Few 3rd party assets that I used in my project: 

1.Unity particle pack from the unity asset store to show the ball's impact effect with the Icospherical map.

2. 4 sound effects(for impact, death, main menu, and level1) from different online sound libraries.

3.3 PNG images(for heart, power, and score manager) for making HUD.

P.S: There were few bugs in the windows build of this game, but I fixed it in the android build, which is completed but will be released on this page after the voting session.
